text:
mEqShastvA# pacaqtaira#vatuq lOhi#tagrIvaqH CAgai$H SalmaqlirvRuddhyA# paqrNO brahma#NA plaqkShO mEdhE#na nyaqgrOdha#Scamaqsairu#duqbaMra# UqrjA gA#yaqtrI CandO#BistriqvRuth stOmaiqrava#ntIqH sthAva#ntIstvA&vantu priqyaM tvA$ priqyANAqM ~Mvar.Shi#ShThaqmApyA#nAM nidhIqnAM tvA# nidhiqpati(gm)# havAmahE vasO mama || 38
(mEqShaH - ShaT tri(gm)#Sat) (A12)
